entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
